document.full_text: robert titcomb, 49, who has known president obama since childhood, was arrested in honolulu after approaching an officer who was posing as a prostitute, police officials said.
document.title: friend of obama is arrested in prostitution sting
lines_and_colors: robert titcomb, 49, who has known president obama since childhood, was arrested in honolulu after approaching an officer who was posing as a prostitute, police officials said.
